Resource PlanDefinition "AbdominalPositioningARDSPlan"

Profile: Recommendation Plan

knowledgeCapability: computable

knowledgeRepresentationLevel: structured

url: https://www.netzwerk-universitaetsmedizin.de/fhir/codex-celida/recommendations/intervention-plan/abdominal-positioning-ARDS-plan

version: 7.0

name: Abdominal_Positioning_Plan_In_Case_Of_ARDS_And_PaO2/FiO2_<_150mmHg,

title: Abdominal positioning plan in case of ARDS and a PaO2/FiO2 < 150 mmHg

type: ECA Rule (PlanDefinitionType#eca-rule)

status: active

experimental: true

subject: Population_COVID19_Ventilated_With_severe_ARDS

date: 2022-02

publisher: NUM CODEX+ CELIDA

description: In ARDS and a PaO2/FiO2 < 150 mmHg, abdominal positioning should be consistently performed, with an abdominal positioning interval of at least 16 hours.

description: In ARDS and a PaO2/FiO2 < 150 mmHg, abdominal positioning should be consistently performed, with an abdominal positioning interval of at least 16 hours.
